title: HTML & Web Structure Fundamentals
description: Learn the foundation of the web by understanding HTML elements, semantic tags, accessibility basics, and proper document structure used in real-world websites.

title: CSS & Responsive Web Design
description: Master modern CSS including Flexbox, Grid, responsive layouts, media queries, and best practices to build mobile-first, responsive websites.

title: JavaScript Core Concepts
description: Understand JavaScript fundamentals such as variables, functions, scope, arrays, objects, loops, async programming, and DOM manipulation.

title: React Fundamentals
description: Learn how to build component-based user interfaces using React, JSX, props, state, hooks, and basic performance optimization techniques.

title: Tailwind CSS for Modern UI
description: Build clean, consistent, and responsive user interfaces rapidly using Tailwind CSS utility classes and modern design practices.

title: Node.js & Express Basics
description: Learn how to create backend servers using Node.js and Express, handle routes, middleware, REST APIs, and basic error handling.

title: MongoDB & Database Essentials
description: Understand NoSQL databases, CRUD operations, schema design, and how to integrate MongoDB with backend applications.

title: Firebase Authentication & Security
description: Implement secure authentication using Firebase including email-password login, Google sign-in, auth persistence, and protected routes.

title: REST API Integration
description: Learn how to connect frontend applications with REST APIs, handle async data fetching, error states, and loading indicators.

title: Web Performance & Optimization
description: Improve website performance by optimizing assets, reducing bundle size, lazy loading components, and following best practices.
